To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private AdvanceBlock _advanceblock;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_advanceblock = AdvanceBlock(symbol);

// In OnData()
if (_advanceblock.IsReady)
{
    var period = _advanceblock.Period.Value;
    var current = _advanceblock.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.advanceblock = self.AdvanceBlock(symbol)

# In OnData()
if self.advanceblock.IsReady:
    period = self.advanceblock.Period.Value
    current = self.advanceblock.Current.Value
